column3: hom Basan anantwiber a hom wɔ Samaria bepɔw do a hom hyɛ abɔbɔfo
column5: na hom se hɔn wuranom dɛ

column2: "EWURADZE Nyankopɔn aka no krɔnkrɔnyɛ ho ntam
column5: nda bɛba hom do a wɔdze dadze kɔtɔkorba bɔtwe hom akɔ
column6: na wɔdze apofo nkwaba atwe hom nkaase so."

column2: "Na hom bodua ban ntokur mu epue
column3: obiara afa n’enyim tsenn; na hom atow homho egu Harmon

column4: mbɛma mbrato ndɔɔ so; na hom mfa hom kum afɔr mbra anapa anapa
column5: na hom ebupɛn du du ndaansa ndaansa;"

column2: "na hom mfa mbɔr kawee nhyew ndaase afɔr
column3: na hom nhyɛ ayamuyi ayɛyɛdze na hom mfa ntahye: na iyi na hom pɛ

column2: "Na emi so memaa hom se kwawee wɔ hom nkurow nyina mu
column3: na edziban ho hia wɔ hom mbeambea nyina: naaso hom nnsanee mmbaa me nkyɛn

column2: "Na emi so makam hom nsutɔ ber a nkyɛ aka abosoom ebiasa na otwaber edu no: na motɔɔ nsu guu kurow kor do
column3: na mamma bi anntɔ enngu kurow kor so do: nsu tɔree guu kwaa bi do
column4: na kwaa a nsu anntɔ enngu do no

column2: "Dɛm ntsi nkurow ebien anaa ebiasa wonawonae kɔr kurow kor do kɔnoom nsu na wɔammee: naaso hom nnsanee mmbaa me nkyɛn EWURADZE na ɔse."
"Medze ohuw na ɔpo mabɔ hom: hom nture na hom wenyin nture na hom adɔmbandua na hom ngondua dodow no mbɛbɛw awe: naaso hom nnsanee mmbaa me nkyɛn
"Medze ɔyardɔm a ɔtse dɛ Egypt dze no aba hom mu: medze afona ekuku hom mberantsɛ
column3: na masoa hom mpɔnkɔ kɔ; na mama hom nseraban mu bɔnee asoɛr adɔ hom ahwen mu mpo: naaso hom nnsanee mmbaa me nkyɛn
dɛ mbrɛ mubutuuw Sodom na Gomora
column4: na hom yɛɛ dɛ gyantsia a woetu efi gya mu: naaso hom nnsanee mmbaa me nkyɛn: EWURADZE na ɔse."
mbrɛ medze bɛyɛ wo nye yi oo: osiandɛ mebɛyɛ wo dɛm ntsi

column6: na ɔkyerɛ nyimpa dza ɔwɔ n’adwen mu
column8: na otsiatsia asaase no sorɔnsorɔmbea do no; EWURADZE
